mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count, m_name, m_grade FROM members WHERE m_id=#{id } AND AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(m_pw),'sik')=#{pw } AND m_grade > 5

mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET ndel=1 ndel=0 WHERE nno=#{nno}
